name: ext_R5_MedicationKnowledge_indicationGuideline
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MedicationKnowledge.indicationGuideline for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationKnowledge.indicationGuideline from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationKnowledge|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Guidelines or protocols for administration of the medication for an indication
element.definition: Guidelines or protocols that are applicable for the administration of the medication based on indication.
